name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in high-performance application development, particularly in compliance-driven sectors. Proficient in **PHP**, **Node.js**, **Python**, **React**, **TypeScript**, and frontend technologies like **Tailwind CSS**. Demonstrated expertise in automated testing frameworks such as **Jest**, **Cypress**, and **PHPUnit** to ensure application reliability.
Experienced in creating scalable applications using cloud services like **AWS**, including **ECS** and **Lambda**, and facilitating microservices architecture and system design. Adept at employing **Docker** for containerization and leveraging **GitActions** for continuous integration.
Strong background and problem-solving skills in collaborative environments, focusing on clean architecture and SaaS solutions. Committed to driving technical excellence in development while ensuring alignment with industry standards.

experience.responsibilities:
- Developed and maintained full-stack applications using **Node.js**, **PHP**, **Python** (FastAPI), and **React** (17-18), maintaining standards of clean architecture and system design.
- Implemented microservices architecture, leveraging **Docker** and **AWS Lambda** for scalable and resilient systems in various SaaS projects.
- Collaborated effectively in a team environment, enhancing productivity and problem-solving capabilities through active participation in design and development discussions.
- Built dynamic user interfaces with **TypeScript** and **Tailwind CSS**, ensuring seamless user experience across platforms.
- Utilized **MySQL** and **Redis** to manage and optimize data storage and retrieval processes, achieving a 30% increase in system performance.
- Automated testing processes using **Jest**, **Cypress**, and **PHPUnit**, significantly improving code reliability and reducing bugs by 40% in production.
- Integrated CI/CD pipelines utilizing **GitHub Actions** to ensure smooth deployment processes, achieving zero downtime during releases.
- Conducted systems analysis and developed solutions to enhance functionality, achieving a 25% faster response time in critical application features.
- Enhanced collaboration among cross-functional teams using Agile methodologies to consistently meet project deadlines and maintain high-quality output.
- Executed rigorous testing strategies to ensure compliance with security standards while improving the overall security posture by at least 35%.

• Developed and implemented scalable microservices architecture using **Node.js (NestJS/Express)** and **Python (FastAPI, Django)**, enhancing system performance and reliability for **9+** high-volume financial platforms.
• Built dynamic front-end applications utilizing **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, employing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to achieve responsive designs that improved user engagement by **30%**.
• Created real-time analytics dashboards using **React** and **D3.js**, integrating with **Power BI Embedded** to provide operational teams actionable insights, resulting in a **20%** reduction in response time for transaction anomalies.
• Designed and implemented an event-driven architecture with **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, enabling seamless communication in critical workflows such as payments and compliance, positively impacting transaction processing times by **25%**.
• Developed ETL pipelines for financial data ingestion using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory** for both batch and real-time processing, handling data from **5+** internal and third-party sources.
• Built and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, achieving early detection of **15%** more suspicious transactions through enhanced behavioral analysis.
• Created ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification using **MLflow** and **Airflow**, successfully optimizing model inference and enhancing system throughput by **10%**.

Utilized **PHP** and **Node.js** (NestJS, Express) to design and optimize backend services for a scalable e-commerce platform, achieving **99.9%** uptime and enhancing performance across critical modules like checkout and order fulfillment.
Engineered real-time functionalities leveraging **WebSockets** and event-driven architecture with **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, facilitating instant order updates and dynamic inventory tracking, directly contributing to a **30%** increase in user engagement.
Developed engaging frontend applications with **React** (18), **TypeScript**, and **Tailwind CSS**, ensuring responsive designs that led to a **25%** reduction in page load times across both web and mobile platforms.
Managed data storage and access utilizing **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Redis**, providing fault tolerance and swift data retrieval that improved transaction speeds during peak traffic periods by **40%**.
Integrated AI/ML-based recommendation systems using **scikit-learn** and **TensorFlow** to tailor product listings and enhance search accuracy, resulting in an uplift in conversion rates by **15%**, based on continuous data analysis.
Implemented effective caching strategies with **Redis**, significantly optimizing application refresh times and reducing database load by **50%**.
Facilitated feature management through **LaunchDarkly** and **Kubernetes**, ensuring seamless blue-green deployments and comprehensive risk management during system updates.
Crafted responsive UIs with **Next.js** and **Vue 3 + Nuxt**, adhering to SEO and accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1), facilitating increased organic search traffic by **20%**.
Designed secure payment integrations with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, ensuring compliance with PCI standards through tokenization and rigorous security measures.
Enforced role-based access control (RBAC) and OAuth 2.0 protocols, maintaining high security for customer and admin operations and ensuring adherence to GDPR regulations.
